text: Yakshcho svidky ye znaydeni buty vynuvati uperedzhennya, todi dva inshykh povynni buty poprosheni shchob vzyaty yikhni mistsya. Vyberit聞 dvokh osib shcho victimized pershymy svidkamy, ta dozvolyayut聞 yim prysyahayut聞 BOHOM: "Nashe svidchennya ye bil聞she pravdyve nizh yikhniy; my ne budemo buty uperedzhenyy. Inakshe, my budemo porushnyky
